description:
Gnostice XtremeDocumentStudio .NET is the next-generation multi-format document-processing component suite for .NET developers. Currently, it supports viewing, printing, and converting PDF, DOCX, DOC, BMP, JPEG, PNG, WMF, EMF, TIFF and MTIFF. More formats will be introduced in future. XtremeDocumentStudio includes multi-format document viewer controls for WinForms, WebForms, MVC, WPF, and HTML5. It can also convert document from one format to another, such as DOCX-to-PDF or PDF to images without requiring any other external software or libraries. It can also intelligently reconstruct page elements when converting PDF to DOCX. Some features such as programmatic document-creation, document-editing, and mail-merge have been introduced as a preview or beta.

XtremeDocumentStudio .NET is 100% managed code. It can natively process supported formats without requiring external software such as Microsoft Word, Open XML SDK, Word Automation Services, Adobe PDF library or GhostScript.
releaseNotes:
Version 2016 R6 - October 19, 2016
==================================
Enhanced
~~~~~~~~
+ HTML5 Document Viewer
  - appSettings (in Web.Config)
    * Introduced "PathMode" property to specify whether 'DiskPath' should be considered as absolute path or relative path.
  - Server-side features:
    * Optimized server document caching on disk.
    * Optimized server document caching in memory.
  - Client-side features:
    * Refresh viewer layout : refresh()
    * Introduced "Preferences.renderingDpi" property to set view document quality.
    * Introduced "Preferences.printingDpi" property to set print document quality.
+ Multi-Format Document Viewer / Printer / Converter
  - [NEW] Excel Support [BETA]
    * Format Supported
      + XLSX
      + XLS
      + ODS
    * Features
      + Content
        - Text
        - Rich Text
        - Images
      + Formatting
        - Text Wrapping
        - RichText
        - Cell Formats
          * Number
          * Currency
          * Date
          * Time
          * Percentage
          * Special
        - Cell Merging
          * Horizontal
          * Vertical
      + Introduced “Formatter Settings” [to accept input to layout spreadsheet documents] under “Preferences” of DocumentViewer/Printer/Converter controls.
        - Page Settings
          * Margin
          * Size
          * Orientation
        - LayoutDirection 
          * ForwardZ
          * BackwardN
        - GridLinesView [boolean]
        - GridLinesPrint [boolean]
+ Document Engine
  - PDF
    * PDF object.
      + Deleting annotations supported.
    * PDFAnnot
      + Reading and setting modified date is enabled
    * PDFMarkupAnnot
      + Replying to existing annotation is supported.
      + Reading and setting intent type for annotation is supported.
    * PDFIntentType
      + Enumerations to set intent types are introduced.	  
Fixed
~~~~~
+ HTML5 Document Viewer
  - Document navigation using toolbar buttons throws exception in ASP.NET MVC Application.
  - Initial viewersettings request fails in ASP.NET MVC Application. 
  - Page indicator background color changes.
  - Page indicator dimension changes.
  - Search dialog background color shown as white and search text entered is not visible in Safari.
+ WinForms Document Viewer
  - Anchors causing problem in placing document pages in the viewer
+ Mail-Merge
  - Fields were not merging while specifying the custom map
+ Multi-Format Document Viewer / Printer / Converter
  - Issue with Tabs spacing in Word formats
  - DOC: Using Master Allocation table to construct FAT sector chain
+ Document Converter
  - Converting High resolution images
  - PDF to DOCX with only images, resulting DOCX was blank
  - DOCX to PDF with Unicode characters
  - DOCX to PDF with huge images with transparency
summary: View, print and convert PDF, DOCX, DOC, BMP, JPEG, PNG, WMF, EMF, and single-page and multi-page TIFF. Provides ASP .NET viewer, WinForms viewer, MVC viewer and WPF viewer components.
title: Gnostice XtremeDocumentStudio .NET Ultimate
